source_objects.title: Social Media Marketing
source_objects.description: Become a Social Media Maven with courses that can increase your social media presence: create a social media strategy, underderstand Facebook, Twitter and more.

items.title: Facebook  Live Masterclass: Engage More With Facebook Live
items.headline: ATTENTION SOLOPRENEURS: Are You Ready To Generate Unlimited Leads & Sales Using Facebook Live?

You will learn how to get use to the interface and configure your settings.
You will learn how to create your first broadcast and which features to select when doing it.
